adr_address: 24 Av. des États Unis, 63000 Clermont-Ferrand, France
formatted_address: 24 Av. des États Unis, 63000 Clermont-Ferrand, France
name: Le Trib’s

reviews.text: After this legendary 7F, we're going back to the tribe's next week for the discount, hoping to greet the cockroaches again. With this damn sofa that hosted my FIFA Champ' debut, these rooms where you can't even see a mattress, this TV that's about to collapse on the floor, this wall covered in koe, it's with great anticipation that I'll return to this legendary place of Clermont's networks (or not lol the 7F) 🧡
Quite a charming place, full of good vibes. Impeccably clean and very tasteful decor. A big thank you to the hosts for keeping this magical place running.

A mecca for Clermont-Ferrand entertainment.
I highly recommend a visit here. As a thrill-seeker, I instantly felt in my element as soon as I arrived.
Thank you.
Chambéry, the capital
A magnificent place where there is no shortage of atmosphere! I will go back there with my family to remember my student life!
